pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 彼は既婚者なのだから、将来のことを考えなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: As he is a married man, he has to think of the future.

lessons.japanese: 彼は既婚者なのだから、将来のことを考えなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: As he is a married man, he has to think of the future.

lessons.japanese: 彼は既婚者で二人の子持ちだ。
lessons.indonesian: He is married with two children.

lessons.japanese: 彼は既婚者で二人の子持ちだ。
lessons.indonesian: He is married with two children.

lessons.japanese: どうして既婚者なんかと付き合ってるの？
lessons.indonesian: Why are you hanging around with a married woman?

lessons.japanese: メアリーは既婚女性です。
メアリーが既婚者だって、トムは思ってたんだって。
lessons.indonesian: Tom said he thought that Mary was married.

lessons.japanese: メアリーが既婚者だって、トムは思ってたんだって。
lessons.indonesian: Tom said that he thought Mary was married.

lessons.japanese: メアリーが既婚者だって、トムは思ってたんだって。
